t: Luke 17
Temptations to Sin
And*p he said to his disciples, “Temptations*r to*r sin*r are*r sure*r to*r come,*r but*r woe*r to*r the*r one*r through*r whom*r they*r come!*r

It*r would*r be*r better*r for*r him*r if*r a*r millstone*r were*r hung*r around*r his*r neck*r and*r he*r were*r cast*r into*r the*r sea*r than*r that*r he*r should*r cause*r one*r of*r these*r little*r ones*r to*r sin.*r
Pay*r attention*r to*r yourselves!*r If*r your*r brother*r sins,*r rebuke*r him,*r and*r if*r he*r repents,*r forgive*r him,*r
and*r if*r he*r sins*r against*r you*r seven*r times*r in*r the*r day,*r and*r turns*r to*r you*r seven*r times,*r saying,*r ‘I*r repent,’*r you*r must*r forgive*r him.”*r
Increase Our Faith
The*p apostles said to the Lord, “Increase our faith!”

And the Lord said, “If*r you*r had*r faith*r like*r a*r grain*r of*r mustard*r seed,*r you*r could*r say*r to*r this*r mulberry*r tree,*r ‘Be*r uprooted*r and*r planted*r in*r the*r sea,’*r and*r it*r would*r obey*r you.*r
Unworthy Servants

“Will*rp any*r one*r of*r you*r who*r has*r a*r servant*r plowing*r or*r keeping*r sheep*r say*r to*r him*r when*r he*r has*r come*r in*r from*r the*r field,*r ‘Come*r at*r once*r and*r recline*r at*r table’?*r

Will*r he*r not*r rather*r say*r to*r him,*r ‘Prepare*r supper*r for*r me,*r and*r dress*r properly,*r and*r serve*r me*r while*r I*r eat*r and*r drink,*r and*r afterward*r you*r will*r eat*r and*r drink’?*r
Does*r he*r thank*r the*r servant*r because*r he*r did*r what*r was*r commanded?*r
So*r you*r also,*r when*r you*r have*r done*r all*r that*r you*r were*r commanded,*r say,*r ‘We*r are*r unworthy*r servants;*r we*r have*r only*r done*r what*r was*r our*r duty.’”*r
Jesus Cleanses Ten Lepers
On*p the way to Jerusalem he was passing along between Samaria and Galilee.
And as he entered a village, he was met by ten lepers, who stood at a distance
and lifted up their voices, saying, “Jesus, Master, have mercy on us.”
When he saw them he said to them, “Go*r and*r show*r yourselves*r to*r the*r priests.”*r And as they went they were cleansed.
Then one of them, when he saw that he was healed, turned back, praising God with a loud voice;
and he fell on his face at Jesus’ feet, giving him thanks. Now he was a Samaritan.
Then Jesus answered, “Were*r not*r ten*r cleansed?*r Where*r are*r the*r nine?*r
Was*r no*r one*r found*r to*r return*r and*r give*r praise*r to*r God*r except*r this*r foreigner?”*r
And he said to him, “Rise*r and*r go*r your*r way;*r your*r faith*r has*r made*r you*r well.”*r
The Coming of the Kingdom
Being*p asked by the Pharisees when the kingdom of God would come, he answered them, “The*r kingdom*r of*r God*r is*r not*r coming*r in*r ways*r that*r can*r be*r observed,*r
nor*r will*r they*r say,*r ‘Look,*r here*r it*r is!’*r or*r ‘There!’*r for*r behold,*r the*r kingdom*r of*r God*r is*r in*r the*r midst*r of*r you.”*r
And*p he said to the disciples, “The*r days*r are*r coming*r when*r you*r will*r desire*r to*r see*r one*r of*r the*r days*r of*r the*r Son*r of*r Man,*r and*r you*r will*r not*r see*r it.*r
And*r they*r will*r say*r to*r you,*r ‘Look,*r there!’*r or*r ‘Look,*r here!’*r Do*r not*r go*r out*r or*r follow*r them.*r
For*r as*r the*r lightning*r flashes*r and*r lights*r up*r the*r sky*r from*r one*r side*r to*r the*r other,*r so*r will*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r be*r in*r his*r day.*r
But*r first*r he*r must*r suffer*r many*r things*r and*r be*r rejected*r by*r this*r generation.*r
Just*r as*r it*r was*r in*r the*r days*r of*r Noah,*r so*r will*r it*r be*r in*r the*r days*r of*r the*r Son*r of*r Man.*r

They*r were*r eating*r and*r drinking*r and*r marrying*r and*r being*r given*r in*r marriage,*r until*r the*r day*r when*r Noah*r entered*r the*r ark,*r and*r the*r flood*r came*r and*r destroyed*r them*r all.*r
Likewise,*r just*r as*r it*r was*r in*r the*r days*r of*r Lot—*r they*r were*r eating*r and*r drinking,*r buying*r and*r selling,*r planting*r and*r building,*r
but*r on*r the*r day*r when*r Lot*r went*r out*r from*r Sodom,*r fire*r and*r sulfur*r rained*r from*r heaven*r and*r destroyed*r them*r all—*r
so*r will*r it*r be*r on*r the*r day*r when*r the*r Son*r of*r Man*r is*r revealed.*r

On*r that*r day,*r let*r the*r one*r who*r is*r on*r the*r housetop,*r with*r his*r goods*r in*r the*r house,*r not*r come*r down*r to*r take*r them*r away,*r and*r likewise*r let*r the*r one*r who*r is*r in*r the*r field*r not*r turn*r back.*r
Remember*r Lot’s*r wife.*r
Whoever*r seeks*r to*r preserve*r his*r life*r will*r lose*r it,*r but*r whoever*r loses*r his*r life*r will*r keep*r it.*r
I*r tell*r you,*r in*r that*r night*r there*r will*r be*r two*r in*r one*r bed.*r One*r will*r be*r taken*r and*r the*r other*r left.*r
There*r will*r be*r two*r women*r grinding*r together.*r One*r will*r be*r taken*r and*r the*r other*r left.”*r
And they said to him, “Where, Lord?” He said to them, “Where*r the*r corpse*r is,*r there*r the*r vultures*r will*r gather.”*r
